name: Venusian Vengeance (itch)
description:
Note: You can play this game in episodic format in your browser here: http://renegadesector.com/venusianvengeanceep1/.  You can purchase the game if you want to have it all in one package outside of your browser.

Venusian Vengeance is a retro-style top-down run’n'gun.  In an alternate history where the Communists won the space race and colonized Venus, you are sent by the Americans to infiltrate their secret laboratory on Venus to uncover and sabotage their plans for a new super-weapon.
